# ğ“†„ ğ“² ğ“‡‹ feather â‰ˆ #wt â‰ˆ void

In Linear B, there is a small ligature for male: Ï€ (phallus?)  
In Egyptian the feather viper has a similar 'v' on its head: ğ“†‘  
A similar ligature turnes [ğ“†„](ğ“†„)Shu into ğ“†…Fea together ğ“†…ğ“†„FeaShur feather.  
[phoenix](phoenix) â‹ ğ“…¥ benhuron [ğ“…£](ğ“…£) notice "ph" ligature
